item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, March 3, 2025 at 9:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Firefly ‘Blue Ghost’ lunar lander touches down on the moon (411 points | 101 comments)
2. Made a scroll bar buddy that walks down the page when you scroll (275 points | 119 comments)
3. The top 10% owns 87% of the stocks (192 points | 202 comments)
4. Permacomputing (18 points | discuss)
5. Man's brain turned to glass by hot Vesuvius ash cloud (49 points | 10 comments)
6. Solarpunk (339 points | 154 comments)
7. Robust Wavefront OBJ model parsing in C (5 points | 1 comment)
8. MIT 6.S184: Introduction to Flow Matching and Diffusion Models (48 points | 4 comments)
9. Substance in broccoli, celery inhibits graying of black hair (15 points | 4 comments)
10. Harvest the sun twice: Agrivoltaics promises sustainable food, energy and water (46 points | 10 comments)
11. Gooey rubber that's slowly ruining old hard drives (186 points | 119 comments)
12. Show HN: Tangled – Git collaboration platform built on atproto (60 points | 3 comments)
13. BM25 in PostgreSQL (84 points | 15 comments)
14. Speedrunners are vulnerability researchers, they just don't know it yet (270 points | 71 comments)
15. Smallpond – A lightweight data processing framework built on DuckDB and 3FS (248 points | 60 comments)
16. Hallucinations in code are the least dangerous form of LLM mistakes (235 points | 177 comments)
17. Blender-made movie Flow takes Oscar (433 points | 60 comments)
18. We in-housed our data labelling (27 points | 14 comments)
19. The Pentium contains a complicated circuit to multiply by three (269 points | 91 comments)
20. Begrudgingly Choosing CBOR over MessagePack (39 points | 17 comments)
21. API design note: Beware of adding an "Other" enum value (164 points | 90 comments)
22. Kaspersky exposes hidden malware on GitHub stealing personal data (131 points | 64 comments)
23. A Few of the Birds I Love (50 points | 13 comments)
24. Schools reviving shop class (204 points | 142 comments)
25. Why do we have both CSRF protection and CORS? (166 points | 85 comments)
26. Geothermal power is a climate moon shot beneath our feet (209 points | 205 comments)
27. Show HN: Free Kindle Scribe Weekly Planner Creator (8 points | 2 comments)
28. Rackmounting that which should not be rackmounted (31 points | 8 comments)
29. Gödel's theorem debunks the most important AI myth – Roger Penrose [video] (131 points | 253 comments)
30. Show HN: Prompting LLMs in Bash scripts (56 points | 4 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, March 3, 2025 at 9:20 AM UTC
